participant_1.background:
I'm not big on Comic Con because it's too crowded, but my shop has a couple of pieces of custom upholstery that were commissioned by comic book artists.
I'll always cherish the time I spent playing with my siblings and cousins in the backyard.
My family is very supportive and understands my condition.
I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

participant_2.background:
I collect rare and unusual medical oddities to help me feel better about my own health.
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
my family gets together every saturday.
i am always looking for wildlife when i am outside.
I earn money from my farm and YouTube channel.

content.text: Hi! What's your name?
Hey there! My name is participant_2. How about you?
I'm participant_1. What do you do for a living?
I run a farm and YouTube channel. What about you?
I'm an upholsterer! I make custom furniture and home goods.
That sounds really interesting! How did you get into that?
I've always been crafty and loved working with my hands. I started out making small things, like pillows and curtains, and then I started taking on larger projects.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for new ways to challenge myself.
Me too! I think that's what keeps life interesting.
I agree! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love being able to create something beautiful and useful out of nothing.
That's a great feeling! I love seeing the end result of my work.
Me too! It's so rewarding to see something that you've created come to life.
I bet! What's your least favorite thing about your job?
I'm not sure I have a least favorite thing. I love everything about it!
That's great! I wish I could say the same.
What's your least favorite thing about your job?
I guess it would be the long hours. I can put in a lot of work on my farm and YouTube channel.
I can understand that. I sometimes have to work long hours too.
I guess it's all worth it in the end.
I think so! I love what I do
